basics.name: Chulwon Park
basics.label: Ph.D. Student in Economics
basics.summary: Ph.D. student in Economics at Sogang University specializing in Macroeconomics, International Finance, and Econometrics. My research focuses on monetary and fiscal policy transmission, global financial cycles, and the economic impact of climate shocks using satellite data[cite: 9, 14, 37].

work.name: Korea Institute of Public Finance (KIPF)
work.summary: Designed and implemented a dynamic stochastic general equilibrium (DSGE) model and conducted model calibration based on Korean macro-fiscal data[cite: 31, 32, 33].

work.name: Sogang University
work.position: Research Assistant to Professor Jun Hee Kwak
work.summary: Prepared and cleaned trade and firm-level data for Korea and analyzed causal effects of policy using local projection methods[cite: 34, 35, 36, 37].

work.name: Sogang University
work.summary: Assisted in graduate and undergraduate courses including Advanced Macroeconomics, Dynamic Programming, and Macroeconomics I & II[cite: 23, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30].

volunteer.summary: Led weekly economic research discussions, presentations, and organized academic seminars and workshops for Sogang University students.
Organized academic and cultural events and managed communication between faculty and students.

awards.title: BK21 Four Fellowship
awards.summary: Awarded to selected graduate students for research excellence under the Ministry of Education's national funding program.

publications.name: Global CIP deviation Factor
publications.summary: Co-authored with Jaeho Kim. Published in Vol. 16 No. 2, pp. 57-74[cite: 18, 19].

references.name: Prof. Jun Hee Kwak
references.reference: Advisor, Department of Economics, Sogang University (jhkwak@sogang.ac.kr)

projects.name: Firm-level Investment Responses in an Open Economy
projects.summary: Investigating whether domestic monetary policy matters for investment in open economies, with Jun Hee Kwak and Yoonsoo Lee[cite: 9, 10].

projects.name: Rebalancing Housing Taxes for an Aging Economy
projects.summary: Analyzing the impact of housing tax adjustments in the context of an aging population[cite: 11, 12].

projects.name: From Drought to Dinner
projects.summary: Research on climate shocks and food import inflation using satellite indices[cite: 14].
